author: bryanduxbury
msg: THRIFT-1038. java: Generated Java code for structures containing binary fields (or collections thereof) are not serializable (in the Java sense) even though they implement java.io.Serializable
This patch causes Java Serialized Thrift structs to be serialized onto the stream via the Compact Protocol.

author: kmarsden
msg: DERBY-4985 BootLockTest can fail with ERROR XCY03: Required property 'derby.serviceProtocol' has not been set with slow configurations
